scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run createTable && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run admin && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec babel-node ./server/app.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run dropTables && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run createTable && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run admin && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel-node ./server/app.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run dropTables && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run createTable && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run admin && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=text --reporter=html mocha server/test/allTest.js --require @babel/polyfill  --require @babel/register --exit
